original_text: Be ready by the morning, and come up in the morning to Mount Sinai, and present yourself there to me on the top of the mountain.
korean_text: 아침까지 준비하고 아침에 시내 산에 올라와 산 꼭대기에서 내게 보이되

sentences.original_text: and come up in the morning to Mount Sinai
and present yourself there to me
on the top of the mountain
